Corner the Market.Title: Corner the Market
Corner the Market.Desc: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.

Diversify Research.Title: Diversify Research
Diversify Research.Desc: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors

Found Research Outpost.Title: Found Research Outpost
Found Research Outpost.Desc: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties

Intimidate Council.Title: Intimidate Council
Intimidate Council.Desc: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System.

Lead from the Front.Title: Lead from the Front
Lead from the Front.Desc: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

Amass Wealth.Title: Amass Wealth
Amass Wealth.Desc: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.

Engineer a Marvel.Title: Engineer a Marvel
Engineer a Marvel.Desc: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board.

Explore Deep Space.Title: Explore Deep Space
Explore Deep Space.Desc: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

Improve Infrastrure.Title: Improve Infrastrure
Improve Infrastrure.Desc: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

Make History.Title: Make History
Make History.Desc: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

Populate the Outer Rim.Title: Populate the Outer Rim
Populate the Outer Rim.Desc: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

Push Boundaries.Title: Push Boundaries
Push Boundaries.Desc: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.

Raise a Fleet.Title: Raise a Fleet
Raise a Fleet.Desc: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

Conquer the Weak.Title: Conquer the Weak
Conquer the Weak.Desc: Control 1 planet in the home system of another player

Form Galactic Brain Trust.Title: Form Galactic Brain Trust
Form Galactic Brain Trust.Desc: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties

Galvanize the People.Title: Galvanize the People
Galvanize the People.Desc: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

Master the Sciences.Title: Master the Sciences
Master the Sciences.Desc: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.

Unify the Colonies.Title: Unify the Colonies
Unify the Colonies.Desc: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

Stake your Claim.Title: Stake your Claim
Stake your Claim.Desc: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

Demonstrate Your Power.Title: Demonstrate Your Power
Demonstrate Your Power.Desc: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

The Rest Of These Are Probably Wrong.Title: The Rest Of These Are Probably Wrong

Expand Borders.Title: Expand Borders
Expand Borders.Desc: Control six planets in non-home systems.

Form a Spy Network.Title: Form a Spy Network
Form a Spy Network.Desc: Have 5 action cards in your hand.

Gather a Mighty Fleet.Title: Gather a Mighty Fleet
Gather a Mighty Fleet.Desc: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.

Make History.Title: Make History
Make History.Desc: Control Mecatol Rex and have at least 3 ships in its system.

Master the Laws.Title: Master the Laws
Master the Laws.Desc: Have 3 or more laws in play.

Occupy the Fringe.Title: Occupy the Fringe
Occupy the Fringe.Desc: Control a planet that is in a system adjacent to an anomaly.

Protect the Border.Title: Protect the Border
Protect the Border.Desc: Have a space dock in a system that contains a planet you control that is adjacent to a planet another player controls.

Prove Endurance.Title: Prove Endurance
Prove Endurance.Desc: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

Raise a Fleet.Title: Raise a Fleet
Raise a Fleet.Desc: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

Rule Distant Lands.Title: Rule Distant Lands
Rule Distant Lands.Desc: Control a planet that is in a system that is not adjacent to your home system.

Sway the Council.Title: Sway the Council
Sway the Council.Desc: Be elected by a law or have a planet you control be elected by a law.

Turn Their Fleets to Dust.Title: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
Turn Their Fleets to Dust.Desc: Destroy 2 ships belonging to another player in a single space combat.

Unveil Flagship.Title: Unveil Flagship
Unveil Flagship.Desc: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship.

Wield Core Influence.Title: Wield Core Influence
Wield Core Influence.Desc: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

Wield Core Resources.Title: Wield Core Resources
Wield Core Resources.Desc: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

Become the Gatekeeper.Title: Become the Gatekeeper
Become the Gatekeeper.Desc: Control both an alpha and a beta wormhole.

Defy Space and Time.Title: Defy Space and Time
Defy Space and Time.Desc: Have a unit in the wormhole nexus.

Forge an Alliance.Title: Forge an Alliance
Forge an Alliance.Desc: Have a promissory note in your play area that was not dealt to you.

Diversify Research.Title: Diversify Research
Diversify Research.Desc: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.

Engineer a Marvel.Title: Engineer a Marvel
Engineer a Marvel.Desc: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

Establish Hegemony.Title: Establish Hegemony
Establish Hegemony.Desc: Be neighbors with all other players.

Raise a Legion.Title: Raise a Legion
Raise a Legion.Desc: Have 9 ground forces on a single planet that does not contain a space dock.

Reclaim Ancient Monuments.Title: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
Reclaim Ancient Monuments.Desc: Control 2 planets that each have a technology specialty.

Revolutionize Warfare.Title: Revolutionize Warfare
Revolutionize Warfare.Desc: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

Scavenge Remnants.Title: Scavenge Remnants
Scavenge Remnants.Desc: Have 2 relic fragments of the same type.

Threaten Enemies.Title: Threaten Enemies
Threaten Enemies.Desc: Control a planet in a system adjacent to another player's home system.

Turn Their Worlds to Ashes.Title: Turn Their Worlds to Ashes
Turn Their Worlds to Ashes.Desc: Use bombardment to destroy all infantry on a planet.

Vanquish Their Armada.Title: Vanquish Their Armada
Vanquish Their Armada.Desc: Destroy another player's flagship or war sun.

Wipe Their Forces.Title: Wipe Their Forces
Wipe Their Forces.Desc: Destroy all of another player's fighters in a single combat using anti-fighter barrage.
